00029 HDASS08::HDASS08()
00030     : KMainWindow( 0, "HDASS08",WStyle_NoBorder | WStyle_Customize  )
00031 {
00032  //DAVID Setting BackGround pixmap
00033   pixBackground.load("/home/sonicat/hdass08/skin-background.jpg");
00034   setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00035   xSetup();
00036 }

00042 void HDASS08::xSetup()
00043 {
00044   //DAVID Init PlayList Here
00045   HDASS_PLAY_LIST=new hdassplaylist(this,"PlayList");
00046   
00047   //DAVID Show the Function Control Widget 
00048   
00049   Display =new DisplayArea(this,"DisplayArea");
00050   Display->setGeometry(0,0,800,600);
00051   Display->show();
00052   
00053   ControlArea=new Function_Control_Area(this,"ControlArea");
00054   ControlArea->setGeometry(665,465,135,135);
00055   ControlArea->show();
00056   
00057   
00058   Bar=new FunctionBar(this,"FunctionBar");
00059   Bar->setGeometry(0,520,665,80);
00060   Bar->show();
00061   
00062   HDASS_KEYBOARD =new keyboard(this,"HDASS_KEYBOARD");
00063   HDASS_KEYBOARD->move(100,100);
00064   HDASS_KEYBOARD->hide();
00065   strKeyboardString=QString();
00066   /*
00067 
00068   */
00069   QObject::connect(ControlArea,SIGNAL(signalChangeFunc(int )),Bar,SLOT(slotChangeFunctionSubBar(int )));
00070   QObject::connect(ControlArea,SIGNAL(signalBackToManagement()),Display->Media,SLOT(slotBackToManagement()));
00071   QObject::connect(Bar->BarAC,SIGNAL(signalAlbumClockModeChangeToDispalyArea(int )),Display,SLOT(slotDisplayModeChange(int )));
00072   QObject::connect(Bar,SIGNAL(siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(int)),Display,SLOT(slotDisplayModeChange(int )));
00073   
00074   //DAVID Handle the connection between Bar and Display Buttons
00075   QObject::connect(Bar->BarInternet->SubBarBtnInternet_Next, SIGNAL(clicked()), Display->Browser, SLOT(handleNext()));
00076   QObject::connect(Bar->BarInternet->SubBarBtnInternet_Previous, SIGNAL(clicked()), Display->Browser, SLOT(handlePrevious()));
00077   QObject::connect(Bar->BarInternet->SubBarBtnInternet_Home, SIGNAL(clicked()), Display->Browser, SLOT(handleHome()));
00078   
00079   //DAVID Handle the connection betwwen Album Control Buttons and all theirs corresponding function
00080   QObject::connect(Bar->BarAC->SubBarBtnPrevious,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Album,SLOT(slotPreviousImage()));
00081   QObject::connect(Bar->BarAC->SubBarBtnNext,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Album,SLOT(slotNextImage()));
00082   QObject::connect(Bar->BarAC->SubBarBtnPlayNPause,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Album,SLOT(slotPlayNStop()));
00083   
00084   //DAVID Handle the connection between  ImageDetail Control Buttons and their  corresopnding functions 
00085   QObject::connect(Bar->BarID->SubBarBtnPrevious,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Media->imgdetial,SLOT(slotPreviousImage()));
00086   QObject::connect(Bar->BarID->SubBarBtnNext,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Media->imgdetial,SLOT(slotNextImage()));
00087   QObject::connect(Bar->BarID->SubBarBtnPlayNPause,SIGNAL(pressed()),Display->Media->imgdetial,SLOT(slotPlayNStop()));
00088   
00089   //DAVID Handle the connection between Volume Buttons and the Myplayer
00090   QObject::connect(Display->IA->IABtnVolumeUp, SIGNAL(pressed()), Bar->BarPlayer->m_player, SLOT(increase_volume()));
00091   QObject::connect(Display->IA->IABtnVolumeDown, SIGNAL(pressed()), Bar->BarPlayer->m_player, SLOT(decrease_volume()));
00092   
00093   QObject::connect(Display->IA,SIGNAL(signalReadList()),HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SLOT(slotPLRequest()));
00094   QObject::connect(HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SIGNAL(signalPLSend(KURL::List )),Display->IA,SLOT(slotReadListFromPlayList(KURL::List )));
00095   QObject::connect(Bar->BarPlayer,SIGNAL(signalRequestPL()),HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SLOT(slotPLRequest()));
00096   QObject::connect(HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SIGNAL(signalPLSend(KURL::List )),Bar->BarPlayer,SLOT(insertMedia(KURL::List )));
00097   
00098   QObject::connect(Display->IA,SIGNAL(signalRemoveList(KURL::List, HDASS_ACTION_TYPE )),HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SLOT(slotReciveList(KURL::List, HDASS_ACTION_TYPE )));
00099   QObject::connect(Display->Media->musicFIV,SIGNAL(signalAddFileToList(KURL::List, HDASS_ACTION_TYPE )),HDASS_PLAY_LIST,SLOT(slotReciveList(KURL::List, HDASS_ACTION_TYPE )));
00100   
00101   QObject::connect(Bar->BarManagement,SIGNAL(signalManagementModeChange(int )),Display->Media,SLOT(slotChangeMode(int )));
00102   QObject::connect(Bar->BarManagement,SIGNAL(signalMkdir()),this,SLOT(slotKeyboardShow()));
00103   QObject::connect(Bar->BarManagement,SIGNAL(singalPasteFUNC_MEDIAM()),Display->Media,SLOT(slotPaste()));
00104   QObject::connect(Bar->BarManagement,SIGNAL(signalCutFUNC_MEDIAM()),Display->Media,SLOT(slotCut()));
00105   QObject::connect(Bar->BarManagement,SIGNAL(signalDeleteItem()),Display->Media,SLOT(slotDeleteItem()));
00106   QObject::connect(Display->Media->imgFIV,SIGNAL(signalShowTheDetialofImage(KURL )),Display->Album,SLOT(slotShowFloder(KURL )));
00107   
00108   QObject::connect(Display->Media,SIGNAL(signalImageDetial()),ControlArea,SLOT(slotShowImageDetial()));
00109   QObject::connect(Display->IA,SIGNAL(signalPlayItem(QString)),Bar->BarPlayer->m_player,SLOT(play(QString)));
00110   QObject::connect(Display->IA,SIGNAL(singalPlayItem()),Bar->BarPlayer,SLOT(slotClickFromPlayList()));
00111   QObject::connect(Bar->BarPlayer->m_player,SIGNAL(trackMessage(int, int, QString, QString, QString )),Display->IA,SLOT(slotHadleSongInfo(int, int, QString, QString, QString )));
00112   
00113   QObject::connect(HDASS_KEYBOARD,SIGNAL(signalEnter()),this,SLOT(slotKeyboardHide()));
00114   QObject::connect(HDASS_KEYBOARD,SIGNAL(signalString(QString )),this,SLOT(slotKeyboardString(QString )));
00115   
00116   QObject::connect(Display->Media,SIGNAL(signalShowKeyboard()),this,SLOT(slotKeyboardShow()));
00117   QObject::connect(this,SIGNAL(signalMkdir(QString )),Display->Media,SLOT(slotMkdir(QString )));
00118   Display->IA->ReadList();
00119 }
00120 void HDASS08::slotShow()
00121 {
00122     this->show();
00123 }
00124 void HDASS08::slotKeyboardShow()
00125 {
00126    //Set Disable
00127   
00128    HDASS_KEYBOARD->show();
00129    //Display->setEnabled(false);
00130    //ControlArea->setEnabled(false);
00131   // Bar->setEnabled(false);
00132 }
00133 void HDASS08::slotKeyboardHide()
00134 {
00135   
00136   HDASS_KEYBOARD->hide();
00137   //Display->setEnabled(true);
00138   //ControlArea->setEnabled(true);
00139  // Bar->setEnabled(true);
00140   emit signalMkdir(strKeyboardString);
00141 }
00142 void HDASS08::slotKeyboardString(QString s)
00143 {
00144   strKeyboardString=s;
00145   qWarning(strKeyboardString);
00146 }
